languages.text: {n}Маражай выпрямляется и поворачивается к вам, держа что-то в руках.{/n} "Тебе недостало того, что ты уже пережил{mf||а} в переплетениях Темного города? Ха. Похвальная жажда познания".

{n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай выпрямляется и поворачивается к вам, держа что-то в руках.{/n} "Тебе недостало того, что ты уже пережил{mf||а} в переплетениях Темного города? Ха. Похвальная жажда познания".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋挺直了身子，转向你，手里拿着什么东西。{/n}“你已经在黑暗之城的罗网中体验到了很多，莫非你还没有满足吗？哈，你对知识的渴望很值得赞赏。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋挺直了身子，转向你，手里拿着什么东西。{/n}“你已经在黑暗之城的罗网中体验到了很多，莫非你还没有满足吗？哈，你对知识的渴望很值得赞赏。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}背筋を伸ばしてこちらを向いたマラズハイは、手に何かを持っていた。{/n}「仄暗き都での騒動の経験じゃ、まだ物足りないってか？はっ、その知識欲には恐れ入るな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}背筋を伸ばしてこちらを向いたマラズハイは、手に何かを持っていた。{/n}「仄暗き都での騒動の経験じゃ、まだ物足りないってか？はっ、その知識欲には恐れ入るな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se endereza y se vuelve hacia ti, sosteniendo algo entre las manos.{/n} «¿No estás {mf|satisfecho|satisfecha} con lo que has presenciado en la maraña de la Ciudad Siniestra? Je. Tu sed de conocimiento me parece encomiable».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se endereza y se vuelve hacia ti, sosteniendo algo entre las manos.{/n} «¿No estás {mf|satisfecho|satisfecha} con lo que has presenciado en la maraña de la Ciudad Siniestra? Je. Tu sed de conocimiento me parece encomiable».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se redresse et se tourne vers vous. Il a quelque chose entre les mains.{/n} « Ce petit avant-goût du dédale de la Cité Crépusculaire ne vous suffit pas ? Ma foi, votre soif de connaissance vous honore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se redresse et se tourne vers vous. Il a quelque chose entre les mains.{/n} « Ce petit avant-goût du dédale de la Cité Crépusculaire ne vous suffit pas ? Ma foi, votre soif de connaissance vous honore. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai richtet sich auf und wendet sich dir zu. Er hält etwas in den Händen.{/n} "Seid Ihr nicht zufrieden mit dem, was Ihr im Gewirr der Dunklen Stadt bereits erlebt habt? Ha. Ein lobenswerter Wissensdurst".
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai richtet sich auf und wendet sich dir zu. Er hält etwas in den Händen.{/n} "Seid Ihr nicht zufrieden mit dem, was Ihr im Gewirr der Dunklen Stadt bereits erlebt habt? Ha. Ein lobenswerter Wissensdurst".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dikleşerek sana dönüyor. Avuçlarında bir şey tutuyor.{/n} "Kara Şehir kördüğümünde hâlihazırda deneyimlediklerin seni tatmin etmedi mi? Hah. İrfana karşı açlığın takdir edilesi."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai straightens and turns to you, holding something in his hands.{/n} "You are not satisfied with what you have already experienced in the tangle of the Dark City? Ha. A laudable thirst for knowledge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dikleşerek sana dönüyor. Avuçlarında bir şey tutuyor.{/n} "Kara Şehir kördüğümünde hâlihazırda deneyimlediklerinle tatmin olamadın mı? Hah. İrfana karşı açlığın takdir edilesi."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
